subject: Frauds and Swindling
UEFA European Football Championship
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The governing body of European soccer said Wednesday that it was investigating the possible involvement of three referees and one "other official connected to UEFA," in what the organization calls the biggest match-rigging scandal ever in Europe.
snippet: The governing body of European soccer said Wednesday that it was investigating the possible involvement of three referees and one "other official connected to UEFA," in what the organization calls the biggest match-rigging scandal ever in Europe.
